patthana22.29:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho nasappaccayo dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa sappaccayassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye tīṇi.
patthana22.29:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasanidassanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana22.29:3.1: Naanidassanaappaṭigho nanasanidassano dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa nasanidassanassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Ārammaṇe tīṇi, adhipatiyā upanissaye purejāte atthiyā avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.29:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nasappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho sappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, adhipatiyā nava …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.29:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naappaṭighaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho appaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.29:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ narūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho rūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.29:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naarūpiṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho arūpī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.29:8.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana22.29:9.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.29:10.1: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokiyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. Hetuyā ekavīsa.
patthana22.29:11.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokiyañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokiyañca dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa …pe… avigate ekavīsa.
patthana22.29:12.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nalokuttaraṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.29:13.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho kenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañcatiṃsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pannarasa …pe… avigate pañcatiṃsa.
patthana22.29:14.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanakenaci viññeyyaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nakenaci viññeyyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañcatiṃsa, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe pannarasa …pe… avigate pañcatiṃsa.
